meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exterior.
meanings.sent1: The exteriority of the house was well-maintained and clean.
meanings.sent2: She admired the exteriority of the beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The exteriority of the cake was so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His calm exteriority hid the storm of emotions within.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors added to the exteriority of the painting, making it stand out.

meanings.definition: The outward or external aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: The exteriority of the building was impressive with its modern design.
meanings.sent2: The exteriority of the car was sleek and shiny.
meanings.sent3: The exteriority of the cat's fur was so fluffy that it seemed like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her warm exteriority made everyone feel welcome and comfortable.
meanings.sent5: The grand exteriority of the castle left visitors in awe of its beauty.

meanings.definition: The state of being outside or beyond something.
meanings.sent1: The exteriority of the forest was peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the exteriority of the city, away from the hustle and bustle.
meanings.sent3: The exteriority of the playground was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurous spirit embraced the exteriority of the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The vast exteriority of the ocean stretched out endlessly before them.
